Articles.Content:
Just wanted to say hi to fellow kerbanauts!

Just downloaded the demo and am learning how to not be an internet lawn dart, progress is slow, ranks of volunteers don\'t seem to be thinning out though ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
I hope you have as much fun inventing new ways to blow up green men as we do.

well, the green body-count is getting a little substantial now...have to do some reading up on getting to the Mun, I keep messing up on that piece...off to you-tube I guess.... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Trydyingtolive!

Look that name up on Youtube. 

**Necromancy and Tubes!**

**-Arcane** 

(Is it not funny that I just put two books of magic in the same **?)**
Welcome! I hope all your launches be spectacular (explosive or not) Happy Launches!

Thanks all, learning the game and some parts mods with the demo; i will probably get the retail version soon, I can\'t tell you how many brave kerbalnauts have given their lives to entertain me .. I think I owe their familes 15 bucks....![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Getting closer to landing on the Mun, I apparently am a lousy orbital mechanic right now... but I guess any landing you can walk away from is a good one...

Not sure where else to put this, but a friend of mine who works in the aircraft engine world sent me this shuttle vid.

Best one I have seen in a while, thought I would share....I already want to capture pieces of the sound for some KSP sound file changes ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

enjoy: [http://www.youtube.com/watch_popup?feature=player_embedded&v=2aCOyOvOw5c#](https://www.youtube.com/watch_popup?feature=player_embedded&v=2aCOyOvOw5c#)
